scripts.dev: concurrently -c "red,blue" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.db+dev: npm run db:start --prefix server && concurrently -c "red,blue" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.clean: concurrently -c "red,blue" "npm run clean --prefix server" "npm run clean --prefix client"
scripts.build: concurrently -c "red,blue" "npm run build --prefix server" "npm run build --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently -c "red,blue" "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run preview --prefix client"
